message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can negotiate further if you want.

Alice, that initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 65/35 split in my favor. This acknowledges my decreasing returns over time and gives us both a sizable sum.
I'm willing to split it 50/50 now.  It's a fair compromise, and we both get a decent amount despite inflation.
